Description: For sale is a 2001 Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Custom 57RI in a beautiful Ebony Black Beauty VOS with original case and Yamano Music Cert. Yamano Music is a distributor in Japan that is known to buy only the finest quality of Gibson guitars. Each one comes with a special Yamano Music Certificate. Unfortunately, we do not have the original Gibson COA. This guitar is in very good condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches, dings, tarnish to the gold hard-wear, and some wear on the back. Overall, I would give it a solid 8.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or major issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with only minor wear. There is no buzzing or dead spots. The original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.70" 1st Fret: 0.91" 12th Fret: 1.01" Neck Type: 50's Finger Board: Ebony Pickups: Burstbucker 1&2 Weight: 9lb 10oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7.05% sales tax. Please call, text, or message me if you have any questions 18013179013. This item does ship worldwide. All items are shipped with full insurance and signature confirmation so there is no risk for you the buyer. I am very familiar with shipping internationally. This item will be packed very safe and secure. International buyers are responsible for any import duties. International purchases will ship UPS. Please use the shipping calculator for a shipping quote. Shipping anywhere in the continental USA is $60 via UPS ground.
